title: Balkrishna Paper Mills Limited
summary: Balkrishna Paper Mills Limited has informed the Exchange about Copy of Newspaper Publication:We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company in their meeting held on 13th August, 2025, have inter alia approved the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for...
fullContent: Balkrishna Paper Mills Limited has informed the Exchange about Copy of Newspaper Publication:We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company in their meeting held on 13th August, 2025, have inter alia approved the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended June 30, 2025. We had also submitted the full results to BSE & NSE and the same are available on the Stock Exchanges websites at www.nseindia.com and www.bseindia.com. We had also uploaded the said results on the Company s website at www.bpml.in. Further, pursuant to the captioned regulation, we had published the said results in newspapers in Business Standard & Mumbai Lakshadeep with QR Code on August 15, 2025. We now send herewith the said News Paper cuttings for your perusal.Kindly take the above on record and acknowledge. |SUBJECT: Copy of Newspaper Publication
